books.title: A Game of Thrones
books.author: George R. R. Martin
books.description: Set in a medieval world, the kingdom is set into a state of turmoil as the noble houses compete to determine a king. In addition, an exiled princess tries to find her way to return to the throne. Violence, espionage, politics, and conspiracy are all at the center of the conflict. Meanwhile, an ancient threat rises in the North and threatens the entire kingdom.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Addy Osmani
books.description: The book follows a young shepherd who receives a dream about a treasure found in the pyramids of Egypt. He sells his sheep in preparation for this journey to fulfill this dream. On his journey he encounters various people who encourage the shepherd to fulfill this personal journey. What treasure lies in the depths of the Egyptian pyramids?

books.title: Animal Farm
books.author: Axel Rauschmayer
books.description: Animal Farm is a political satire of the events of the Russian Revolution which transitioned to the Stalin Regime of the Soviet Union. Orwell uses farm animals to represent individuals as they revolt against the tyrannical human farm owner. However, the successful revolution leads to a downwards spiral as their ideologies become warped at the hands of a few individuals.

books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.author: Eric Elliott
books.description: This is a mystery thriller novel follows a symbologist, Robert Langdon, who is responsible for investigating a murder in the Louvre museum. As he goes deeper in the investigation, he discovers an age-old conspiracy about Jesus Christ.

books.title: The Hunger Games
books.author: Nicholas C. Zakas
books.description: The book follows the story of a young female protagonist, Katniss Everdeen. She is born in a poor sector of her society and she voluntarily participates in a yearly battle royale between sectors of her society to protect her younger sister.

books.title: Green Eggs and Ham
books.subtitle: ES6 & Beyond
books.author: Kyle Simpson
books.description: This is a children’s book that follows a character named “Sam-I-am” as he is persistently followed by another character to consume some green eggs and ham.

books.title: The Bloody Chamber
books.author: Richard E. Silverman
books.description: Fairy tales and legends. Angela Carter has created a compilation of her dark short stories.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's's Stone
books.subtitle: Harnessing the Power of the Web
books.author: Glenn Block, et al.
books.description: Design and build Web APIs for a broad range of clients—including browsers and mobile devices—that can adapt to change over time. This practical, hands-on guide takes you through the theory and tools you need to build evolvable HTTP services with Microsoft’s ASP.NET Web API framework. In the process, you’ll learn how design and implement a real-world Web API.
